title: [信息]Boosted Join——简单易用的登录提示[1.7-1.14]
author: monseasd
txt_content:
本帖最后由 monseasd 于 2019-7-27 16:07 编辑 

一款简单便捷的登陆提示插件当前版本：1.9.3  作者：zarotli

授权搬运

插件特色
占位符和emojis登入服务器提示和退出服务器提示首次登陆提示首次登陆提示标题和副标题首次登陆MOTD＆登陆MOTD（多行）登陆信息显示排名和音乐重载命令＆BJ重新加载PlaceHolderAPI支持登陆音乐可完全自行配置游戏内可编辑

PlaceHolderAPI

%total% = the number of total new playersthat was in the server

%player% = name of the player


Icons:

[size=14.6667px]# %icon1% = [size=14.6667px]
[size=14.6667px]# %icon2% = [size=14.6667px]
[size=14.6667px]# %icon3% = [size=14.6667px]
[size=14.6667px]# %icon4% = [size=14.6667px]
[size=14.6667px]# %icon5% = [size=14.6667px]

权限
BJ.RANK1  -  12 =登入＆退出信息排行
BJ.ADMIN = / BJ reload＆/ BJ Command
/ bj - 显示所有命令
[size=14.6667px]/ bj reload - 重新加载config 
[size=14.6667px]/ bj motdmessage - 显示motd消息[size=14.6667px]
/ bj firstmotdmessage - 显示第一个motd消息

Config.yml

[size=14.6667px]# Enables & Disables Title On Join （登陆标题）

[size=14.6667px]TitleEnable: true

[size=14.6667px]# Title That Shows On Screen （屏幕上显示的标题）
[size=14.6667px]TitleJoinMessage: '&7Welcome Back &9%player%'

[size=14.6667px]# SubTitle That Shows On Screen （屏幕上显示的副标题）
[size=14.6667px]SubTitleJoinMessage: '&7Hope You Will Enjoy Your Stay'


[size=14.6667px]# Enables & Disables Title On First Join Title （首次登陆标题是否开启）
[size=14.6667px]FirstJoinTitleEnable: true

[size=14.6667px]# Title That Shows On Screen If The Player Haven't Been On The Server Before （新玩家登陆标题）
[size=14.6667px]TitleFirstJoinMessage: '&9%player% &7Welcome To The Server'

[size=14.6667px]# SubTitle That Shows On Screen If The Player Haven't Been On The Server Before （新玩家登陆副标题）
[size=14.6667px]SubTitleFirstJoinMessage: '&7Hope You Will Enjoy Your Stay'

[size=14.6667px]# Set Your First Join Message （设置你的首次登陆信息）
[size=14.6667px]# PlaceHolders: （参见上面PlaceHolderAPI一栏）
[size=14.6667px]# %total% = the number of total new players that was in the server
[size=14.6667px]# %player% = name of the player
[size=14.6667px]# Icons:
[size=14.6667px]# %icon1% = [size=14.6667px]
[size=14.6667px]# %icon2% = [size=14.6667px]
[size=14.6667px]# %icon3% = [size=14.6667px]
[size=14.6667px]# %icon4% = [size=14.6667px]
[size=14.6667px]# %icon5% = [size=14.6667px]

[size=14.6667px]# Enables & Disables First Join Message （首次登陆信息）
[size=14.6667px]FirstJoinMessageEnable: true

[size=14.6667px]FirstJoinMessage: '&6Player &9%player% &7joined for the first time! &7(&9#%total%&7)'

[size=14.6667px]# Sound That Will Play On Join （连接服务器时播放的声音）
[size=14.6667px]# Can Take Sounds From [size=14.6667px]http://docs.codelanx.com/Bukkit/1.8/org/bukkit/Sound.html
[size=14.6667px]FirstJoinSound: AMBIENCE_THUNDER

[size=14.6667px]# Enables & Disables Join Message （登陆信息）
[size=14.6667px]JoinMessageEnable: true

[size=14.6667px]JoinMessage: '&8[&a%icon2%&8] &9%player% &7Joined The Server'
[size=14.6667px]# Sound That Will Play On Join If The Player Haven't Been On The Server Before （新玩家连接服务器时播放的声音）
[size=14.6667px]# Can Take Sounds From [size=14.6667px]http://docs.codelanx.com/Bukkit/1.8/org/bukkit/Sound.html
[size=14.6667px]SoundOnJoin: AMBIENCE_THUNDER

[size=14.6667px]# Enables & Disables Leave Message （退出服务器提示）
[size=14.6667px]LeaveMessageEnable: true

[size=14.6667px]LeaveMessage: '&8[&c%icon3%&8] &9%player% &7Left The Server'


[size=14.6667px]FirstMotdMessageEnable: true

[size=14.6667px]FirstMotdMessage: （首次MOTD信息）
[size=14.6667px]- '&9-&7-&9-&7-&9-&7-&9-&7-&9-&7-&9-&7-&9-&7-&9-&7-&9-&7-&9-&7-&9-&7-&9-&7-&9-&7-&9-&7-&9-&7-&9-&7-&9-&7-'
[size=14.6667px]- '&8[&a%icon1%&8] &7This Is Your First Time!'
[size=14.6667px]- '&8[&a%icon1%&8] &7Welcome %player% To The Server'
[size=14.6667px]- '&8[&a%icon1%&8] &7Do &8/Help &7To Get Help'
[size=14.6667px]- '&9-&7-&9-&7-&9-&7-&9-&7-&9-&7-&9-&7-&9-&7-&9-&7-&9-&7-&9-&7-&9-&7-&9-&7-&9-&7-&9-&7-&9-&7-&9-&7-&9-&7-'

[size=14.6667px]#Enables & Disables Motd Message On Join 
[size=14.6667px]MotdMessageEnable: true

[size=14.6667px]MotdMessage:
[size=14.6667px]- '&9-&7-&9-&7-&9-&7-&9-&7-&9-&7-&9-&7-&9-&7-&9-&7-&9-&7-&9-&7-&9-&7-&9-&7-&9-&7-&9-&7-&9-&7-&9-&7-&9-&7-'
[size=14.6667px]- '&8[&a%icon1%&8] &7Welcome Back %player% To The Server '
[size=14.6667px]- '&8[&a%icon1%&8] &7Do &8/Help &7To Get Help'
[size=14.6667px]- '&9-&7-&9-&7-&9-&7-&9-&7-&9-&7-&9-&7-&9-&7-&9-&7-&9-&7-&9-&7-&9-&7-&9-&7-&9-&7-&9-&7-&9-&7-&9-&7-&9-&7-'

[size=14.6667px]#Ranks Join & Leave Messages （登陆&退出信息排行）
[size=14.6667px]#Permission : BJ.RANK1
[size=14.6667px]# Can Take Sounds From [size=14.6667px]http://docs.codelanx.com/Bukkit/1.8/org/bukkit/Sound.html

[size=14.6667px]Ranks:

[size=14.6667px]Rank1JoinMessage: '&8[&bVIP&8] &a%player% &7Joined The Server'
[size=14.6667px]Rank1LeaveMessage: '&8[&bVIP&8] &a%player% &7Left The Server'
[size=14.6667px]Rank1SoundOnJoin: AMBIENCE_THUNDER

[size=14.6667px]Rank2JoinMessage: '&8[&cVIP+&8] &a%player% &7Joined The Server'
[size=14.6667px]Rank2LeaveMessage: '&8[&cVIP+&8] &a%player% &7Left The Server'
[size=14.6667px]Rank2SoundOnJoin: AMBIENCE_THUNDER

[size=14.6667px]Rank3JoinMessage: '&8[&bMVP&8] &a%player% &7Joined The Server'
[size=14.6667px]Rank3LeaveMessage: '&8[&bMVP&8] &a%player% &7Left The Server'
[size=14.6667px]Rank3SoundOnJoin: AMBIENCE_THUNDER

[size=14.6667px]Rank4JoinMessage: '&8[&eMVP+&8] &a%player% &7Joined The Server'
[size=14.6667px]Rank4LeaveMessage: '&8[&eMVP+&8] &a%player% &7Left The Server'

[size=14.6667px]Rank5LeaveMessage: '&8[&1Helper&8] &a%player% &7Left The Server'

[size=14.6667px]Rank9LeaveMessage: '&8[&9H-Admin&8] &a%player% &7Left The Server'
[size=14.6667px]Rank9SoundOnJoin: AMBIENCE_THUNDER

[size=14.6667px]Rank10JoinMessage: '-'
[size=14.6667px]Rank10LeaveMessage: '-'
[size=14.6667px]Rank10SoundOnJoin: AMBIENCE_THUNDER
